channel.title: Kevin Lin Personal Site
channel.description: Hi there! I'm Kevin Lin a Web & Information Systems major attending New Jersey Insitute of Technology. This is my portfolio website.

item.title: AI-Driven Agile and Lean Principles: A High School Principal's Guide
item.description: Is a resource for high school principals that explores how integrating AI technology with agile and lean principles can enhance student learning and improve overall school performance.
item.author: lin.kevin.1923@gmail.com (Kevin Lin)

item.title: The Future of Education: Combining AI, Agile, and Lean Principles for Success
item.description: The future of education involves integrating AI technology and implementing agile and lean principles to improve learning outcomes and student success.
item.author: lin.kevin.1923@gmail.com (Kevin Lin)

item.title: How to Improve Your Website's Usability: Tips and Best Practices
item.description: This article provides tips and best practices to improve your website's usability. Topics include website structure, navigation design, page speed, mobile responsiveness, and accessibility.
item.author: lin.kevin.1923@gmail.com (Kevin Lin)

item.title: How to Optimize Your Website for Search Engines
item.description: Learn how to improve your website's visibility and attract more organic traffic by implementing effective Search Engine Optimization (SEO) strategies with our comprehensive guide.
item.author: lin.kevin.1923@gmail.com (Kevin Lin)

item.title: Dockerizing Your Web Development Workflow
item.description: In this article, we will discuss the benefits of Dockerizing your web development workflow and how it can simplify the process of building and deploying web applications. We'll cover the basics of Docker and provide examples of how it can be used in different development environments.
item.author: lin.kevin.1923@gmail.com (Kevin Lin)

item.title: Streamlining Your Web Testing with Playwright: Tips and Tricks
item.description: Playwright is an open-source Node.js library for automating web browsers that supports multiple web browsers, including Chrome, Firefox, and Safari. It offers cross-browser testing, easy setup, and robust testing features, allowing developers to write maintainable and readable tests that ensure consistency across different platforms.
item.author: lin.kevin.1923@gmail.com (Kevin Lin)
